      • paint

        protected final void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Called to allow you to paint on the canvas. The canvas given is completely clean. You should not use the Graphics object after you return from this method.
        Overrides:
        paint in class CanvasWindow
        Parameters:
        g - This object offers the methods that allow you to paint on the canvas.

      • closeContent

        public final void closeContent(CanvasContent content)
        Closes the passed in content. If that content is the currently displayed content, we switch it out with the previous content.
        Parameters:
        content -
